forbidden.name: not-to-test
forbidden.comment: src shall never depend on anything in test

forbidden.name: not-from-node_modules
forbidden.comment: node_modules depending on stuff in the src tree is positively weird

forbidden.name: not-from-utl
forbidden.comment: utl can be used by prod sources - but not the other way 'round

forbidden.name: not-from-test-utl
forbidden.comment: test/utl can be used by test sources - but not the other way 'round

forbidden.name: not-from-fixtures
forbidden.comment: don't let fixtures touch test or src code

forbidden.name: not-to-punycode
forbidden.comment: don't depend on core module punycode - use the userland one instead
